sentences.english: If the car does not yield to pedestrian, the car could be ticketed.
sentences.chinese: 大多數國家，如果車子不給行人讓路，會被抄罰單的。

sentences.english: The driver was ticketed for parking in front of a fire hydrant.
sentences.chinese: 消防栓前而接到交通違規罰單。

sentences.english: That’s like a parking ticket to me.
sentences.chinese: 就像開張停車罰單那麼簡單。

sentences.english: He tore up a traffic citation for jaywalking in front of the police officer who'd ticketed him.
sentences.chinese: 他當着交通警察的面，把闖越馬路的罰單撕掉了。

sentences.english: Cooper reprimanded his daughter for driving too fast and getting a speeding ticket.
sentences.chinese: 庫珀責備女兒開車太快，以致收到超速轉戶罰單。

sentences.english: So I was quite surprised to receive this citation.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我對這個罰單感到意外。

sentences.english: The cop then proceeds to issue the kid a $20.00 bicycle safety violation ticket.
sentences.chinese: 然後他給小孩兒開了20美元的罰單。

sentences.english: Finish, on the spot since written 100 tickets.
sentences.chinese: 說完，當場自寫了100元罰單。
那張罰單花了我們三百美元。

sentences.english: A blowjob will always get a women off a speeding ticket.
sentences.chinese: 替警察吹吹喇叭會使女人逃過超速罰單。

sentences.english: We got a parking ticket for not putting money in the meter.
sentences.chinese: 因爲沒交停車費我們收到了罰單。

sentences.english: Busted. Mr. Rebete hands him a ticket and informs him of his rights.
sentences.chinese: 雷貝特先生交給了他一張罰單，告知了他應有的權利。

sentences.english: Do you think luxury-car drivers are targeted more for tickets?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲豪華車司機更有可能收到罰單嗎？

sentences.english: He drove quickly so he often got ticketed by the police from the Miristry of Transportation.
sentences.chinese: 有時候開車開得快一點，就會被交通部的警察開罰單。

sentences.english: Chinese Environmental Protection Administration fines leather factories from rich countries every year.
sentences.chinese: “中國環保部門每年都爲富國皮革廠開出罰單”。

sentences.english: In Singapore, a road hog gets a ticket every offen.
sentences.chinese: 在新加坡，路豬經常被開罰單。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
to exceed the time limit/(to work) overtime/(computing) timeout
